sqlMap.select:
select vsp.id,vsc.cat_name as cat_id,vsp.title,vsp.is_recommend,vsp.content,vsp.price,vsp.thumb_url,vsp.keywords,vsp.description,vsp.clicknum, vsp.add_time,vsp.vsort from vs_product vsp,vs_category vsc where vsp.cat_id=vsc.cat_id
and vsp.is_recommend = #isRecommend#
and vsp.cat_id = #cateId#
and vsp.title like concat('%', #filterkey#, '%')
select id,cat_id,title,is_recommend,content,price,thumb_url,keywords,description,clicknum, add_time,vsort from vs_product where id=#id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into vs_product(id,cat_id,title,is_recommend,content,price,thumb_url,keywords,description,clicknum,add_time,vsort) values ((select ifnull(max(vsp.id)+1,1) from vs_product vsp),#cateId#,#title#,#isRecommend#,#content#,#price#,#thumbUrl#, #keywords#,#desc#,#clickNum#,#addTime#,#vsort#)
sqlMap.update: update vs_product set is_recommend=#isRecommend# where id=#id#
